title: Sealfie app

head.title: Protects you from identity thieves.
head.subtitle: Sealfie protects from fake CEO frauds, fake suppliers and more. In the Top5 attempts of frauds 4 involve identity thieves. 1 in 4 company was actual victim of fraud in 2021.

testimonial: Based on proactive, automatic, forensic, anchor in a public blockchain for verification and automation

person.title: Simple
person.text: If you can take a picture with a smartphone, you can use Sealfie

send.title: Certify transactions
send.text: Certify  all sorts of transactions, physical and digital. Prevent tempering and identity theft

path.title: Auditable
path.text: Data can be audited and automated

shield.title: Multi factor certification
shield.text: Sealfie proactively chains evidences, similar to a forensic expert

description.title: Trust in data by chaining multiple certifications
description.text: Sleep at night by trusting the critical information is certified. We use only the data you generated on different systems, for your own protection. Imagine how simpler your digital processes with data you can trust

action.stop: Stop depending on the weakest trained person

phone.title: Phone number
phone.feedback: a valid phone number is mandatory

phonetype.title: Type of phone
phonetype.feedback: We need you type of phone

support: To get help please send a detailed email with your phone number used in the test for us to speed up understanding the issue.
